lom:description.lom:string:
"Two different types of M.S.E. degrees are offerred: one with a primary focus on coursework (Coursework M.S.E.) and one with an emphasis on research (Research M.S.E.).
Requirements for the PhD are: Doctor of Philosophy - Ph.D.
* Course Requirements (68 Credit Hours for Ph.D., 50 Beyond Relevant MS Degree, 2 Cognate Courses) * Students complete an additional 9 hours of formal coursework, above that required for the M.S.E. degree. * Written Exam (Within 2 Years) * Oral Exam (Thesis Research Proposal; Within 2 Years) * One semester of â??Teaching Experienceâ? as Graduate Student Instructor * Submission of a Ph.D. Thesis and Final Defense.

lom:title.lom:string: Graduate Materials Science and Engineering Curriculum - University of Michigan
